title: Railways Minister calls on PM Shehbaz Sharif
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 16 (APP): Minister for Railways Hanif Abbassi Thursday called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif and discussed matters related to Pakistan Railways.
During the meeting, the overall political situation of the country also came under discussion.
The federal minister commended the prime minister over Pakistanâ€™s significant role in facilitating the Gaza peace deal.
